text:
Saya menginap di hotel ini saat bertugas ke Samarinda. Pilihan saya jatuh ke hotel ini karena dekat dengan tempat tujuan tugas. Selain itu hotel ini dipilih karena pemandangannya. Dari jendela hotel kita bisa melihat pemandangan ke jembatan yang di atas sungai Mahakam dan melihat lalu lalang kapal tongkang yang dipandu oleh kapal pemandu untuk melewati jembatan. Sebenarnya letak Harris tidak benar-benar di pusat kota Samarinda, namun tidak begitu jauh. 

Untuk kamar lumayan luas. Saya tidak ingat jenis kamar apa tapi di dalam kamar dilengkapi dengan tempat tidur dan sofa. Kamar juga dilengkapi minibar, TV, dan mini safe, dan perlengkapan yang lainnya. Kamar mandi dilengkapi dengan shower dan ameniti yang lengkap. Untuk kebersihan sangat bagus. 

Saya sangat suka dengan menu sarapannya, terutama mantau goreng yang sangat enak, renyah di luar dan empuk di dalam. Pemilihan buah-buahan juga bagus. Semangkanya sangat manis. Saya dikejutkan juga dengan senam yang dilakukan staf di restoran. karena tidak tahan saya ikut juga bergoyang. Di sore sampai malam hari tamu bisa menikmati bubur kacang ijo dan minuman jahe hangat di lobi hotel dan disajikan gratis.

Di dekat hotel ada toko yang menjual elektronik. Di sebelah tempat parkit terapat ATM lengkap. Kurang lebih 200 meter dari hotel terdapat mall yang sangat besar yang bisa dikunjungi untuk sekedar jalan-jalan atau cuci mata. Hotel juga sangat dekat dengan masjid Agung Samarinda. Di sekitar hotel banyak kuliner murah meriah seperti Mi Godog Jogja dan lainnya.

Secara umum cukup memuaskan juga pengalaman menginap di hotel ini. Kapan-kapan saya pasti kembali.
title: Pemandangan Sungai Mahakam yang Cantik.

Dulu hotel favorit saya di Samarinda sekarang saya tidak akan tinggal di sini lagi.

partner_attribution: Ulasan dikumpulkan dalam kemitraan dengan hotel ini

text:
Check in berjalan sangat singkat.. Tidak perlu menunggu lama..
Kamar hotel sangat bersih, AC sangat dingin, disediakan 2 bantal, 2 guling besar dan 2 guling kecil. Bantal dan guling terlalu padat isinya sehingga menjadi keras untuk tidur. Tempat tidur cukup nyaman meskipun tidak terlalu empuk menurut saya.
Kamar hotel ini mempunyai 2 sisi yang berbeda, satu sisi menghadap ke kota, satu sisi menghadap ke sungai. Saat saya meminta untuk diberikan kamar yang menghadap ke sungai, resepsionis mengatakan  ada tambahan biaya sebesar Rp. 150.000, sehingga saya batalkan saja permintaan saya.
Di kamar tidur disediakan 2 kaca besar (poin plus dari saya). Sangat nyaman untuk merias diri. Kamar tidak terlalu kedap suara. Saya masih bisa mendengar aktivitas orang yang sedang berjalan di depan kamar, ketika ada anak-anak yang memukul-mukul tembok pembatas kamar, saya bisa mendengar jelas sampai membangunkan tidur saya.
Saya menginap di tipe Harris Room. Kamar mandi lumayan luas, tetapi tidak ada bathtub. Hanya shower saja,,,, Wastafel dan shower air hangatnya lancar. Toilet bersih. Disediakan keset, 1 handuk muka, 2 handuk besar dan juga disediakan hair dryer (poin plus dari saya).
Hotel Harris juga menyediakan kolam renang yang berada di lantai 5 yang membuat aktivitas berenang menjadi menyenangkan. Disediakan handuk untuk di kolam renang. Terdiri dari 1 kolam dewasa dan 1 kolam anak-anak. Setiap hari Sabtu, disediakan pelatih renang untuk tamu yang berenang disini (poin plus plus dari saya). Teknik yang diajarkan juga sangat baik, karena si pelatih sempat melatih anak saya saat kami berenang.
Di hotel juga tersedia ruang fitness dan ruang bermain untuk anak-anak di bawah 5 tahun. Tidak bisa memberikan review karena tidak sempat beraktivitas di sana.
Untuk sarapan, antara hari pertama dan hari kedua menu tidak jauh berbeda variasinya. Yang mengecewakan pada hari Minggu jam 8.30 sudah kehabisan dim sum. Padahal waktu sarapan masih ada 1,5 jam lagi. Rasa masakannya biasa saja, tidak terlalu istimewa. 
Terdapat parkir di dalam gedung dan kapasitasnya lumayan bisa mencukupi kebutuhan tamu.
Setiap hari Sabtu dari jam 18.00 - 23.00 wita tersedia prasmanan di samping kolam renang dengan view langsung menghadap ke sungai. Dikenakan biaya Rp. 60.000/orang dewasa dan Rp. 30.000/anak. Disediakan juga live music. Bisa menjadi rekomendasi makan malam romantis di malam minggu.
Proses check out agak lambat menurut saya. Resepsionis kurang ramah dan kurang senyum.
Terima kasih.
title: Hotel di tepi sungai...

text:
Membawa keluarga dengan anak kecil dari Balikpapan ke Tenggarong dan Samarinda. Sengaja memilih hotel ini karena lokasinya yg strategis dari Tenggarong dan ke Balikpapan. Menghindari jalur banjir yang sering terjadi akhir-akhir ini mengingat hujan yang lebat. Dekat dengan Big Mall, memilih pemandangan Sungai Mahakam, dekat dengan jembatan ke Balikpapan dan kolam renang serta kids club utk anak-anak saya. 
Hujan barusan reda ketika saya tiba di Hotel dan akses masuk sdh digenangi air. Satu kompleks dengan minimarket dan pusat elektronik/peralatan rumah tangga. Check in di jam 4 sore ternyata peak hours dan harus antri 3-4 tamu. Mba (Edis / Desti?) di Front office melayani dengan sigap dan cekatan. Saya memesan lewat travel agent kamar dengan pemandangan tepi sungai. Saya meminta satu tempat tidur tetapi oleh travel agent dicatat dua tempat tidur. Front office sangat membantu dengan mengatakan bahwa kamar tidur dengan ruang merokok sudah siap, bed bisa disatukan dan ruangan bisa dikondisikan bebas asap. Karena daripada kamar dengan 1 bed tidak tersedia lagi dan kamar bebas rokok harus menunggu minimal 20 menit. Kemudian setela deposit fund karena tersedia minibar di kamar, kami langsung ke kamar. Pastikan minta dua kunci kamar jika anda bepergian dengan keluarga untuk akses di lift. Dan minta stempel utk karcis parkir jika membawa mobil.
Kamarnya bersih, socket listrik dan penerangan tersedia memadai, tempat tidur dan kursi panjanv sangat nyaman. Kamar mandi, perlengkapan dan peralatannya sangat memadai. Tersedia juga pengering rambut. Meja kerja cukup utk bekerja dengan laptop, tersedia safe deposit box tetapi sayang terkunci (mungkin tidak direset sebelumnya). Pendingin ruangan bekerja maksimal, sangat sejuk utk cuaca di luar yang sangat panas. Tempat tidur cukup tinggi untuk ukuran saya (154cm tinggi saya). Khas Harris yang saya suka adalah menyediakan guling besar dan guling kecil. Kualitas bantal juga nyaman, lembut dan empuk, tidak tipis.
Menu sarapan sangat variatif, saya suka dim sum dan egg stationnya. Rasanya enak sekali. Anak-anak suka sekali kolam renang dan ruangan kids clubnya. Treadmill di pusat kebugaran perlu diperbaiki karena tdk berfungsi kemarin. Petugas perlu tegas untuk melarang tamu dari kolam renang untuk tidak menggunakan lift dalam keadaan basah, karena membahayakan dan tidak nyaman bagi tamu lain. Meski petugas bolak balik mengepel lantai lift tetapi menjadi tidak efisien sekali. 
Menu makanan room service rasanya lumayan, saya memesan pasta, tiba dikamar masih sedikit hangat tetapi mengeras di beberapa bagian. Siapkan uang tunai utk membayar layanan kamar, karena deposit saat check in hanya dipersiapkan untuk mini bar. 
Waktu check out juga efisien waktu.
title: Pilihan untuk akses strategis dan pelayanan yang sangat memuaskan

text:
Pilih hotel ini karena :

1. Hotel langganan lagi penuh

2. Dari dulu pingin coba stay cuma lokasi jauh dan harus lewati keramaian jalan tepian, belum lagi kalo jalanan banjir, U turn nya juga jauh.

3. Termasuk hotel baru dan memang baru pertengahan 2016 ini beroperasi

4. Deket dengan BigMall (Mall terbesar di Samarinda +- 1km lah)

5. Di satu kawasan hotel ada alfamidi, lap. Futsal dan toko elektronik ternama di Samarinda. (Alfamidi tutup jam 11 malam kalo nau beli cemilan atau minuman gak usah bingung)

6. Ada riverviewnya dengan jembatan Mahakam khas Samarinda

Pengalaman:

1. Hotel langganan penuh langsung menuju ke hotel ini, dengan harga +- sama, hotel langganan sudah dapat breakfast, harris belum dapat breakfast

2. Perjalanan macet ditambah banjir, sepanjang jalan berpikir ngapaen juga jauh2 kena macet bela2in nginep di hotel Harris

3. Kalo tujuan ke pusat kota hati2 dengan jam2 macet apalagi kalo lewat jalan tepian

4. Untuk kamar paling murah di rate Rp. 57x.xxx lewat online tanpa breakfast, incl. Breakfast di rate 600an

5. Nuansa khas harris, bersih, rapi, tenang

6. Resepsionis oke, pelayanan cepat

7. Naik lift ke kamar harus pake kartu

8. Suasana lorong tenang, spacenya juga luas jadi gak terasa sesak jalan di lorong

9. Kamar cukup luas, pencahayaan oke, kebersihan mantap

10. Kasur empuk, tv led 32inch dengan siaran digital cukup bening

11. Kagum dengan kamar mandinya, bersih air juga lancar, ada hairdryer, handuk wangi

12. Sepertinya 1 kamar dengan lainnya ada pintu penghubung yang bisa dibuka tutup (kalo saya coba harris surabaya memang bisa terhubung jadi kalo pakai 2 kamar sebelahan, mau ke kamar sebelah bisa lewat dalam dan gak ganggu tamu lainnya)

13. Riverviewnya oke walaupun sungainya yang gak oke..dari parkiran aja kamu bisa foto keren dengan kombinasi bunga, jembatan mahakam, kapal dan sungai.

14. Free wifi di kamar langsung nyambung tanpa password, kecepatannya standart seh gak lemot banget juga

15. Ini yang paling luar biasa menurut saya dan hampir gak.ada di hotel lainnya..colokan listrik ada +- 5 buah belum termasuk yang untuk colokan kepala 3.. hal simple tapi penting dan membuat sangat nyaman..top banget yang ini..

16. Untuk breakfast gak bisa review karena budget waktu itu terbatas haha syukur2 dapet voucher nginep gratis dari Harris

17. Hotel pertama yang saya kasih rate excellent terutama karena colokannya

text:
Waktu itu saya menginap di harris sekitar bulan september 2016, saya memesan dari salah satu website pemesanan hotel, dengan harga 600ribuan weekdays(waktu itu) anda bisa mendapat kamar tipe riverview, sudah termasuk breakfast untuk 2 orang. Untuk ukuran hotel bintang 4 harga 600ribuan terbilang murah, yang unik yaitu flip flops/sandal jepit nya berbeda dari biasanya, yaitu berbentuk telapak kaki..menurut saya itu lucu dan unik.
Untuk menu breakfast, pilihan makanan nya kurang beragam,tetapi yang menarik ada menu spaghetti carbonara yg bisa dibilang jarang ada pada menu breakfast,ruang makan nya cukup luas,ada indoor dan outdoor yg menghadap langsung sungai mahakam.
lokasi nya pun cukup dekat dengan pusat kota, dan tidak sampai 10 menit berjalan kaki menuju mall terbaru Samarinda yaitu Big Mall
Ada outdoor pool di lantai 5,satu lantai juga dengan gym dan cafe nya. Yang menurut saya kurang adalah hotel ini belum menyediakan cocktail, karena saat malam malam sambil duduk di tepi kolam renang, sepertinya asik nih sambil ditemani pina colada atau mungkin frozen blue magarita..Tapi kata waiter belum tersedia cocktail di hotel ini, karena terkendala perizinan
Tapi overall cukup baik,dengan hotel bintang 4 tetapi seharga sekitar 600ribuan
title: Menginap dengan suasana tepi sungai mahakam

text:
Receptionist ramah sekali, tanggap, dan banyak senyum. Enerjik. Langsung saja diberikan welcome drink, orange juice. 

Lift khusus pengunjung, mohon ada petunjuk yang lebih besar dan mudah terbaca. Jangan diberikan petunjuk kecil saja. Sampai salah lift di depan, apalagi lift pengunjung letaknya dibelakang, tersembunyi. 

Hotel baru.  Ya,  itulah kesan pertama saat masuk ke dalam kamar (saya mendapat kamar 1007). Awalnya saya meminta kamar dengan lokasi lantai yg lumayan tinggi dan non smoking. Tapi sayang, kamar belum bisa ready, akhirnya saya ditawarkan untuk kamar agak turun lantai dan mendapat kamar smoking yang dibuka khusus weekend. Receptionist berjanji untuk menetralkan bau ruangan. 
Dan setelah masuk, kamar wangi tanpa bau rokok sedikit pun, apalagi pengap. 
Saya memang sengaja memesan kamar Riverview jauh-jauh hari dan akhirnya dapat juga.  Posisi kamar dapat memandang jembatan mahakam dengan indah. 

Kamar cukup luas, dengan desain interior yang minimalis didominasi warna oranye. Single bed ukuran king, sudah dilengkapi dengan guling (mengingat dihotel lain tidak disertakan guling). Karena masih tergolong hotel baru semua yg ada di dalam kamar masih bersih, termasuk towel, piyama, sprei, dan selimut. Air panas sangat panas (mungkin karena weekday). Tapi sayang, brangkas tidak bisa digunakan, alias terkunci dan tidak bisa dibuka (perlu diperbaiki untuk kedepannya, agar setelah customer check out, brangkas dicek dan dibuka)  padahal saya ingin menyimpan barang berharga saat pergi. 

Kolam renang lumayan (sepi saat weekday) dan menghadap sungai mahakam, sekaligus bisa menikmati jembatan mahakam. 

Lokasi parkir yg perlu diperhatikan. Apalagi parkir motor tamu yang jaraknya jauh didepan hotel. Dan ketika hujan tetap tidak diperbolehkan parkir di basement hotel. Harus diluar. Terpaksa basah deh masuk hotel.

Tempat makan punya view yang bagus. Sama seperti kolam renang. Kurangnya, penempatan makanan yang terpisah-pisah. Saya harus mondar-mandir mengambil hidangan utama. Apalagi dengan stock limit. Harus lapor kalau habis. Menunya pun saya belum bisa mengacungi jempol (dengan harga relatif mahal tapi menu makan pagi kurang bervariasi). 

Overall lumayan ya, belum bisa kasih nilai sempurna, walaupun tergolong hotel baru dan harga promo.
title: Nyaman

text:
Hotel yg sdh lama saya ingin kunjungi dan akhirnya kesampaian,pertama datang hotel ini saat sore hari dan check in mendadak via chat bb dengan official admin harris,untung masih dapat kamar,receptionis sgt professional dengan memprioritaskan tamu yg langsung datang utk check in krn sblmnya reservasi via phone dan online travel sdh closed..walaupun sy g dapat view river with balcony,hehe..
Review saya ttg hotel ini :check in dan check out cepat,ada welcome drink dan welcome snack.

Parkiraannya cukup luas,sayangnya parking floor masih tanah,sebaiknya di kasi pasir dan batu koral biar tdk licin saat basah air 

Dibelakang gedung hotel ini ada toko nuansa elektronik yg sangat lengkap dan swalayan alfamidi,ga susah cari perbekalan.

Ada lapangan futsal outdoor disamping hotel (ga tau free atau tidak).

Lobi hotel cukup luas,resto di bagian pool,fitness centre sangat mengesankan terutama view ny  dan ada karaoke (asiknya) utk sekadar hang out,sayang air kolamnya kurang bersih san alat fitness ny mohon ditambah utk menambah kenyaman tamu yg menginap edisi long stay,dino kid tggl 23-25 juli blm bs diakses,padahal anak saya sangat ingin bermain dia area tersebut (dan kidplay ny ini yg membedakan hotel harris dengan hotel lain yg ada di samarinda).

Belum ada free shuttle transport ke bigmall(kalo bs ditambah fasilitas ini y harris)

Tipe kamar view river with balcony sangat sedikit 10 kamar,padahal tipe ini rebutan saat weekend,hiks..

Liftnya cepat dan ada 2,its good..

House keeping sigap dan cepat. Staf hotel gaul dan masih muda (jangan lupa utk terus continues improvement sikap ramah dan profesionalnya ya harris)

Kamar luas,tv nya sdh teknologi led dan sdh bisa USB playmovie dan ada guling (hotel yg keren),ukuran bed queen size ,ada sofa bed (ga perlu extra bed,hehe),hanya amenities room masih kurang seperti sandal dan tootbrush hanya satu,dihotel lain bintang yg sama dapat dua (mohon ditambah),wi-fi kenceng dan stabil,bathroom ada hair drier,tp selang utk cebok dan keran utk wudhu blm ada (mohon ditingkatkan).

Overall,hotel ini ngangenin dan sangat reccomended,terus ditingkatkan ya

text: Hotel ini masih baru banget, infonya pada saat nginap pada bulan juli baru sebulan buka, saya menginap di kamar yang menghadap sungai, secara harga, cukup pantas dengan view yang pada malam hari sangat bagus, dan pada saat sarapan, makan di area balkon, sembari ditemani sunrise yang menyegarkan. Dari sisi servis juga sangat ramah dan menyenangkan, meskipun sempet terjadi miss communication antar sesama staff, tapi mereka cukup professional, dan saya pikir perlu ditambah lagi jumlah staffnya. Dari sisi fasilitas, kids zone sangat recommended, fitness center karena hotelnya baru buka, jadi alatnya belum lengkap, tapi ok n nyaman, sayang kolam renangnya kurang sedap, airnya keruh dan tampaknya tidak ada sirkulasi airnya, sehingga harus dimaintain kejernihan dan kebersihannya secara manual, dan sepertinya harris belum memiliki staff untuk melakukan ini, life vest nya juga cuma ada 1, life guardnya jadi 1 dengan penjaga fitness center dan saya liat dia juga sekaligus housekeepingnya, kecepatan wi-fi bagus, dan free internet corner di area lobby juga bagus. Dari sisi menu makanan, mungkin karena masih baru, jadi variasi makanannya sedikit, tapi dari sisi rasa, sangat recommended, sayang, khusus untuk yang di cafe di area kolam renang, waktu penyajian makanan lumayan lambat, dan lagi-lagi mungkin karena kekurangan staff. Terakhir dari sisi suasana dan penampakkan, karena masih baru, jadi masih sangat bersih, semoga tetap dijaga. Overall saya sangat puas dengan hotel ini, 5 star dari saya

text:
Stayed with fam at river view rooms with connecting door. 

Pros:
Rooms was clean, spacious and modern. 
Room amenity was great. We had cute slipppers, mini fridge, SDB, hairdrier and bathrobe!
Good river view. You could see the hectic mahakam river traffic which our kiddos loved so much.
Various breakfast menus. 
River view restaurant. Our kiddos loved watching the river while having their breakie at restaurant's balcony.
They had kid pool and kid club which we did not try (will try it next time).
10min walking distance (with our kids, it was almost 20 mins.)to BIG mall Samarinda.
Staff were friendly.

Cons:
No bathtub at rooms.
They had a kinda-outsider-side at the restaurant. It was a low lighting and cold decoration dining area in front of elevator. At a glance, I thought this area was for vampires who avoiding nice-sunny-area of the restaurant.
Taste wise, they should add more flavor to some indonesian food.
Restaurant balcony was smoking area. Too bad since our kiddos loved the balcony view. Wish the add non smoking space there. 
 
Overall, it was a great family stay. Our kiddos ask to stay at Harris river view Samarinda again!
title: Good river view, very close to BIG mall

text:
(+) Overall i had great experience to stayed in Harris for 6 days in a row. When in stayed, they said it was a brand new hotel, that just opened 6 mos before. Staff were friendly, helpful, especially for the Marketing Director. Room was great and clean, equiped with bolsters. Great view from their meeting room, pool, and restaurant. Breakfast served a pretty much complete menu. We can see directly to the beautiful Mahakam river, from meeting room, pool, restaurant and some rooms. Good location, next to mahakam bridge and Big Mall the newest mall in Samarinda. 
(-) Bbq night every thursday was not serving red meat. They said this week is fish and seafood theme. Gym and fitness tools need to be improved. Laundry was clean, but managed poorly. Clothes came the next day, and some of my clothes was switched to other room. Hotel didn't receive pay later when checkout, every bill such as meal should be payed cash at that time. One day in the middle of the night they call my room and asked me to pay some of my bill. And room was not soundproof so we can hear what happened in the another room.
title: Great services, but need improvement

text:
When the receptionist knew I booked from Trip Advisor, they immediately upgrade our room to a river view room, from previous 'only city view'. 

That was my first experience being upgraded after the hotel knew that I'm TA active. A very very nice touch. 

This is the first time we stay in Harris: very good location, just by the Mahakam River. Spotted in the middle of the city, near to the mall and business location. The hotel also had big spacious modern room, with fresh touch, every thing hit the right spot... But only one minor thing. 

I forget to buy mineral water the day before. So we ended up run off of water to drink early in the morning the day after. So we called the receptionist / room service to ask a little favor, asking for complementary mineral water... 

But the response was rather formal and stuffy: they can not give us any extra mineral water, because we already had that before, adding that I only stay for one night. That's the procedure, he said. 

Well I'm not going to argue with that. But one thing for sure, you just drop 1 / 2 star from my review. Upgrading our rooms was very nice, but what about making sure and helping your guests needs; little things that count? Never say no to your customer? 

Sort this principle things, and this hotel is 5 stars.
title: Very Good, but minor Issue...

text:
Came to this hotel for the 1st time during a business trip. At 1st I didn't aware that there was a HARRIS Hotel in Samarinda. Booked it through the website directly, the booking process was simple and fast.
Came to the hotel 4 hours later (I made the booking while on the way to Samarinda from Balikpapan). Reach there and check-in. The check-in process was quite smooth, the have all the data that I put through the website correctly.
The staff was friendly, they also offered to join the member so I could get a discount for room rate for my next stay. I was given a room with a river view. The room was spacious and clean. The one that I like the most was the bed. It is so soft, I forget to look at the brand thou, but It was one of my best sleep so far.
Didnt try the breakfast during my stay, thus I cannot comment further on that. The one problem about the hotel during my stay was the location of the hotel. It was quite far from the city center and tranport was one of the problem, also. It is better to get a rental car to go around Samarinda. But, other than the location, the overall stay was tremendous.
title: The Best of SAMARINDA

text:
I always travel to East Borneo from the last 7 years and this is my first time stayed here, to be honest this is one of the best 4star hotel i've ever stayed. I only stay for one night tho, 'cause i had little business to do in Samarinda. 

I checked-in a bit late and i called the receptionist to keep my room for longer 'cause i was still on my way from Bontang. Check-in process was smooth and running well, receptionist always smile, his name was Jeva (if i'm not mistaken).
Room quite spacey, i prefer non smoking room and city view somehow it's better for  me. I haven't had a chance to try the breakfast 'cause my room was room only and i've got lots to do by the morning.
The internet connection was so-so, i wander why the closer you stand by the bathroom, the better the internet connection will be. People don't do business by the toilet, right?

I demanded for late check-out until 1 pm and they let me without no further question. Very nice of them! And check-out process also smooth and running well, there are two chicks in the front office, Endis and Dhifa, whom always smile during the process, we had little chit-chat at the moment.

I really recommended this hotel to my colleague to stay at this hotel when they visit Samarinda. And i really can't wait to get there for my next visit.
title: Best New Hotel on The Block!!!

text:
Walking distance from the Big Mall but not in the busiest area of the city. The room is much more spacious than we expected, and you can have bridge view from the hotel (not necessarily from all room, I guess, but you can see it by a window near the elevator).

There 2 bolsters (guling) on the bed + 1 small one on the sofa, which was a great addition to our experience. Not a common thing we find in hotels, even other Harris hotel we stayed at didn't have it. When you are Indonesian, you just know how importance this should be. I brought my toddler to this trip/stay, and he was happy enough with the small boolster. We had great sleep overnight. 

The water shower works verywell, which is not eady to find in this city. 👍 We had to wait for the room to be ready for quite a while as our room wasn't ready, they even offered to upgrade us to the suite room so we shouldn't wait any longer, But we didn't take it because their offer was a smoking room yet we expected a non-smoking room.

It wasn't easy to extend room stay though as so many people may have booked rooms, so make sure you planed well.

The staffs were such a great support, they escorted us to the elevator when check in, and to our car when checked out. One of the person I remember was Mrs. Uli. 

(I forgot to rate in my previous submitted review, TripAdvisor ux for rating icons definitely need improvement)
title: Walking distance from the Big Mall, great view, & they provide 2+1 bolster (guling)!

text:
I've stayed in Harris Hotel for 2 nights. It was a pretty good experience at the hotel.
The staff are so friendly, but you need to build a stronger cooperatively related to dinner and breakfast coupon, or may I suggest eliminate the coupon because you can easily filtered the guest list with breakfast/dinner or room only.
The room was very clean, the view is beautiful, the menu on breakfast and dinner were so good, so many varian food and beverage, always available in every buffet menu.
Location is so strategic near of big mall easy accsess. No parking charge at hotel which made me extremely happy.
One thing that I concern, you need to pay more attention to the cleaness of bed sheet and towel. It looks filthy, though I know it has been laundried maybe because of the water or something. 
Overall, everything was good, and I can not wait for my next stay in Harris Hotel.

Thanks in advance.

Last minute check in , overall check-in experience was good and fast , friendly front desk lady ( sorry I forget the name ) , room clean and nice , poor WiFi 

Very disappointed with the service around 5.30 pm I decide to relax and sitting down by the pool area and we realized the bar was closed due covid-19 outbreak , we do understand might be they trying to saving and cutting the cost , so we decide to call the front desk and wanted to order a couple of beer and pizza they advice me to go down to the Harris’s cafe.

After that  I went to Harris cafe they allowing me to order but they didn’t allowing me to consume at the pool side.

After bit argue with the staff .... finally they allowing me to order. 

Very unprofessional service 

Will not recommend this hotel

I keep my breast-milk on your chiller / freezer to make  it the quality is still good.

text: I was a bit skeptikal about this hotel. It is an orange building, located right next to Mahakam Bridge. What kind of hotel with orange color? Well, as it turned out, it is a good hotel. First off, parking spot. It is quite confusing at first with a lot of sign but the marking is not clear. Once you get through the awkward parking experience, you are welcomed by the friendly reception. Quick and easy check in comes next. You'll be asked to leave 300,000.00 IDR as deposit money, which will be returned to you when check out (pro tip-- you can opt-out by asking the hotel to lock the mini bar). The room is clean, as expected. Everything is there, and more. Lots of power outlets. So you don't have to take turn to charge your mobile phones and/or laptops. It's a room for two, right. So, this thing is crucial. The breakfast is great, with various food options. Indoor and outdoor means you smoker can smoke and relax after eating. Ohh, there is outdoor seating on the lobby area, you can sit, smoke, sip your cup of coffee (or tea, or wedang jahe) while relaxing and looking at the view of the Mahakam river. Oops, almost forgot, you'll be likely to get invitation for an extended stay for a cheaper price. If you have the time, take the offer.
title: Great Stay!

text:
First time stay at any Harris Hotel group. Good efficient check in process. Clean room and bathroom. Basic instant coffee and tea bags (2 ea) in the room. Good tv channel selection. Good free breakfast selection of fresh fruit, traditional cakes and other food selection. Good location for the place that I am going every day. Reasonable room rate ... I think. 
Good same day laundry service. 

The let downs:
Soap bar was not provided so I bought one myself and the following day soap bar magically appeared in my bathroom. Not sure why they didn’t provide it in the first place. 
One of the two free drinking bottles provided was only 3/4 full .... again not sure why it was provided. 
No room to place large suit case. Had to place on the floor. 
Writing desk is more of an art piece than functional desk as it is too narrow on one end due to the curve shape. 
Hot water supply is a problem when taking shower late at night. I had to take a couple of luke-warm showers (so did my friend in a different room) when hot water didn’t function as it should. 
The so called “City View” room is really roof top view. There is no view to the city. 
Gym doesn’t open until 7 am which is difficult if you have to leave for work early. 
Room temperature control is hard to understand as it is difficult to get temperature that you want. 
The “cheers” greeting during breakfast is (I think) a little bit out of place for a hotel where majority of the guests are Indonesian. Simple “selamat datang” or “selamat pagi” will do. 
Has a potential to be a good hotel if detail of service is improved.
title: Clean room, comfy bed but service can be improved

owner_response.text:
Cheers Bapak Eko,

Warmest Greeting from HARRIS Hotel Samarinda..

Thank you for taking the time to write us and we truly apologize for the inconvenience. 

The Hotel was running at very high occupancy when the human error took place. But nevertheless, we understand that what you experienced was unacceptable and could have been avoided. 

Our guests are very important for us. Kindly be assured that we are looking into the matter to ensure that it won’t happen again in the future as it does not reflect the standard of our service at HARRIS Hotel Samarinda.

As the improvement, Fitness Center (Gym facility) is now open untill 11pm.

Thank you for bringing up your concerns to us. Should I could be any of assistance, please do not hesitant to contact us at info-harris-samarinda@tauzia.com. 

Once again, apologize for the inconvenience, and I hope you could give us a chance to welcome you again with a much better experience. 

HARRISly yours,

Leon DSLV

text:
My family stayed for 1 night in Harris, 16-17 Aug 2016.
Clean room, new building, clean furniture, refreshing riverview. 

When i was about to swim, the hotel staffs were playing like kids in pool. Throwing one and another into the pool with clothes, even they used their shoes while entering the water. 
If the staff want a party like that, they shall not use guest's facility. Or if they intend to use the pool, hotel could close the pool for certain occasion. 

Apart from that, all the facilities are fine, no complaint.
title: Simple, Riverview, Standard

text: Abbiamo scelto questo hotel a Samarinda e infatti ci siamo trovati molto bene. La camera era ok, con aria condizionata e rispettava tutti gli standard da catena. Non ci hanno dato la camera vista fiume, perché erano già prenotate. Abbiamo pranzato e cenato in hotel perché eravamo troppo stanchi. text: Niet alle kamers hebben uitzicht op de rivier. Vanaf 11 of 12 hoog een groots uitzicht op de rivier en de bruggen, waarvan een in aanbouw. Zo wonderlijk om arbeiders op de bogen van de nieuwe brug te zíen werken. De kamers zijn perfect en van alle gemakken voorzien. Opvallend was dat ik binnen 10 minuten vijf verschillende kamertarieven heb gezien en gehoord. Uiteindelijk via een website geboekt en betaald en tot mijn verrassing kreeg ik toen te horen dat het goedkoper kon. Helaas. Mijn medereizigers hadden een goedkopere kamer met riverview. Ik een duurdere  met stadszicht.  Op zondagochtend moesten we zolang wachten op een van de twee liften, dat we met een dienstlift naar beneden zijn gegaan.
title: Uitzicht

Par contre, la piscine est à l'ombre... C'est assez frais, trop même.

owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest Tristan R,

Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience here at HARRIS Hotel Samarinda.

Indeed, our fabulous roof-top swimming pool offers our guests with a refreshing way to relax overlooking the fascinating Mahakam River. However, we are sorry you had not a positive impression on the swimming pool fee policy. Our swimming pool entrance fee comes with a complementary fresh juice and other than that, guest will also be entitled to access the gym and kids club.   

Once again, we greatly appreciate your feedback and have taken notes on your remarks into our considerations. 

I hope that we will have the pleasure of looking after you and your family on a future visit soon!


HARRISLY Yours,


Management
